global_attributes.comment: Deployment summary: This glider was deployed to the Slope Sea 2 (SS-2) line 2019-06-18T22:58:15 UTC and recovered 2019-09-21T12:56:30 UTC. The glider was caught in eddies and blown off course multiple times throughout the deployment. All science sensors were disabled 2019-09-10 to conserve battery power for recovery. This was a relatively normal deployment.

platform.long_name: OOI Coastal Pioneer 1000m Slocum Glider cp_388
